amendment.description: An amendment numbered 90 printed in House Report 114-683 to prohibit funds to be used to implement a final plan to designate areas of the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge in Alaska as wilderness.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 90 printed in House Report 114-683 to prohibit funds to be used to implement a final plan to designate areas of the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge in Alaska as wilderness.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A075) Agreed to by recorded vote: 237 - 191 (Roll no. 460).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A075) Agreed to by recorded vote: 237 - 191 (Roll no. 460).
